name: Bipole III: Conspiracy of the Mechanical Entity (DEMO)
name_original: Bipole III: Conspiracy of the Mechanical Entity (DEMO)
description:
Bipole III: Conspiracy of the Mechanical Entity is a Python text-based RPG. You play as Lead, an investigator from the Nation of Isle on the Continent of Bipole, to investigate the Country of Rogue as there have been sightings of suspicious activity. Can you uncover the mystery of the Mechanical Nation?

NOTE: This game is a prototype/demo and is highly unstable, and many aspects and areas of the game will be expanded in the future.

Requirements:

  • Python (3.9.0 recommended, not tested on other versions yet)
  • A computer
  • A keyboard
  • Sanity (optional)

Credits:

  • Current version of the game was almost entirely coded by Jackachu, publicly unreleased prototype originally coded by infinityJKA
